name: M-Prototype
description:
I made this game for "The dream arcade archive" jam

Controls

WASD or arrows for movement

'K' to shoot

'L' to moprh (this allow )

All the sprites were made by me.

The music is 'Retro platforming' from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
